name: Plumbing
description:
Scientists found a mysterious type of water-like fluid in a strange area that hasn't ever been touched. They managed to retrieve a sizable sample of it and get it out of the immediate strange area. Your job is to guide it to every lab on the planet while keeping it safe from anything that the liquid may negatively react to.

In the process of getting the water out of the area they were also conducting research on the water and discovered that the liquid possesses unique qualities such as the ability to move perpetually and the potential to fly (float) when influenced. They also discovered that the substance responds negatively to physical interference.

Made for My First Game Jam Summer 2020

DISCLAIMER: This game is not finished and was slightly rushed to meet the jam deadline and as a result we were unable to balance or test the game and get all the feature we wanted in and there may be bugs. The audio (code) is also broken because of this. We might upload a post jam version to fix this.

People who made this possible:

oxygencraft: Programming

wheatman: Art

Ivan D. Beltran: Audio

GitHub (source code)

Assets: Will do soon™ (the original SVGs and Wwise project is not available on GitHub)
